entry.title: Testing Octopress Configuration
entry.content:
This is just a simple test post to see if I have the basic Octopress configuration done correctly. I tried also getting org-octopress configured at the same time but I am getting an error when I evaluate the org-octopress command, so I will get to that later.

Are tables supported? Let’s find out!
